alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 16 at 2:12PM CST until November 18 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, except 8 to 12 inches for northern Iron County possible. * WHERE...Bayfield, Ashland and Iron Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Southern Bayfield, Ashland and Iron counties are likely to see much less lake effect snowfall in this time period with accumulations of 1 to 4 inches possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
